name: One More Chance (danielkleffmann)
description: War and pollution ravaged the Earth, and as the climate changed, the sea levels rose and humanity had to flee land on big vessels called ARKs. As the newly appointed captain of an ARK, the player must make sure the group their charge survives as long as possible, managing resources, while the population grows. But more population, also means more demand for resources. It’s an endless cycle. Will the player’s population be able to survive, or are they doomed to make the same mistakes as their ancestors? It’s up to you to find out.
